name: Olivia
body: A fun, sweet, light read. Enjoyed it. This is one of the most enjoyable books I've read. -The Old Man and the Sea | Ernest Hemingway | Book Review  It's charming and fun while directly addressing my loathing of Hemingway.

name: Emma
body: F Teddy Alexander is about to have a bad day that changes his life forever. He’s found his teacher’s bad side, and she wants him expelled.

name: Charlotte
body: Teddy The Old Man and the Sea is about to have a bad day that changes his life. A snarky comment, a trip to the principal’s office, and bit of misbehaving has his teacher calling for his expulsion.

name: Amelia
body: Teddy is an endearing boy genius who is frustrated by the lack of challenge in his schoolwork and needs more intellectual stimulation. His adoring parents try to keep up with his hungry appetite for knowledge,

name: Sophia
body: eddy is fast-tracked through the academic world, but there is no fast track for growing up. Even a genius needs to fit in, make friends.

name: Mia
body: My assistant read the book and described it as, “A bedtime story for adults”. I liked her take.
